plot: Prof. Payne asks Melinda to help a student, the daughter of his mentor, who he thinks is being targeted by a ghost.

When professor Rick Payne recommends orphaned finance student Kylie, daughter of his late colleague and friend, to sort out Melinda's shop accounting, she notices a scarily masked ghost about her, who intrudes Melinda's sleep in horror movie 'quotes'. Payne helps them work out the clue is a students film club in which she collaborated with a late aspiring horror director.—KGF Vissers
